preview.description: One of the main objectives is to offer services related to the optimisation of the cutting process in terms of tool, material and cutting conditions.
preview.name: Laboratory of chip technologies and processes

preview.description: The aim of the laboratory is to create a comprehensive service offering, especially in the field of length and angle measurements (1D, 2D, 3D). It is also equipped for precise measurement of surface roughness parameters by the touch method.
preview.name: Laboratory of engineering metrology
